summary: Final year computer science student from Indonesia currently studying in Australia. Professional hands-on experience in web development with modern frameworks and game development with a strong ability to collaborate in teams.
skills: Data structures and algorithms using C/C++. Modern web frameworks such as Laravel, TailwindCSS, Alpine.js, Livewire, React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js. Game development using Unity Engine and Godot. Version control system using Git and GitHub. Proficient in English with an IELTS score of 7.0 and native speaker in Indonesian.

education.name: University of Queensland
education.description: Notable courses: Computer Systems Principles & Programming, Information Security, Operating Systems Architecture, Theory of Computing, Programming in the Large.
education.sub_title: Bachelor of Computer Science | Cyber Security Major | GPA: 5.0/7.0

education.name: Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember
education.description: Notable courses: Data Structures, Web Programming, Object Oriented Programming, Framework-Based Programming, Database Management, Software Design, Algorithms Design and Analysis.

description: Teaches international students in various courses throughout the years such as Fundamental Programming, Data Structures, and Algorithms and Computer Programming in C, C++ and Python.
Creates programming problems for quizzes and lab works, conducts tutorial sessions, assists lecturer in grading.
Responsible for all teaching assistants of Fundamental Programming Course of fall 2024, arranged the course's timeline, sets up and maintains the website to hold programming practicum.
Provide help with events held by the laboratory such as community service towards locals and aid the professors.

Design and develop video games on Unity Engine using C# to be used in the 2023 and 2024 Schematics National Logic Competition. Over 1000 players played the game online during the elimination round. The event was later awarded with a 3 star from Puspresnas.

Created the core inventory system and item pick-up mechanism for the first game and led development on user interface for the second game (Schematics 2024). Created new levels through existing code made by predecessors (Schematics 2023).
Developed the company's profile website ensuring a responsive experience across all devices.
Aide the professor's research by creating python scripts to analyze data.

projects.name: Box of Curiosity
projects.description: First game developed for Schematics NLC 2024. Focused on the making of the player's inventory system as well as item pick-up system. Unity Engine was used with C# for the project. Over 1000 players have played the game online.

projects.name: QQ Joker
projects.description: Card matching game developed for the annual GMTK Game Jam. Ranked in the top 5000 games out of over 9000 entries.

projects.name: SEA Catering
projects.tech: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, Next.js, NextUI, Tailwind CSS
projects.description: Catering web app inspired by Hello Fresh with dashboard for both members and admins monitoring subscriptions.
